description: This operation aims at dynamically returning the lowest available fares by providing flight combinations matching the requested route and travel dates.
The search engine collects, filters, ranks and standardizes the flight offers coming from the providers.
The customer can retrieve up to 250 recommendations among the cheapest fares available in the providers’ system.
The customer can also compare different types of fares on a given route in one single call.

The operation also offers several options to customize the search in order to find and return the relevant flight offer depending on the customer’s need. Some of these parameters can be set by default and when the context is specific, they can also be overridden dynamically by adapting the request.
paths.summary: Return list of Flight Offers based on posted searching criteria.

description: Search for the best bookable flight offers from a very simple query where you can specify as little as the travel origin, a destination and a departure date.
paths.summary: Return list of Flight Offers based on searching criteria.

parameters.name: originLocationCode
parameters.description: city/airport [IATA code](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) from which the traveler will depart, e.g. BOS for Boston

parameters.name: destinationLocationCode
parameters.description: city/airport [IATA code](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) to which the traveler is going, e.g. PAR for Paris

parameters.name: departureDate
parameters.description: the date on which the traveler will depart from the origin to go to the destination. Dates are specified in the [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2017-12-25

parameters.name: returnDate
parameters.description: the date on which the traveler will depart from the destination to return to the origin. If this parameter is not specified, only one-way itineraries are found. If this parameter is specified, only round-trip itineraries are found. Dates are specified in the [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2018-02-28

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: the number of adult travelers (age 12 or older on date of departure).

parameters.name: children
parameters.description: the number of child travelers (older than age 2 and younger than age 12 on date of departure) who will each have their own separate seat. If specified, this number should be greater than or equal to 0

parameters.name: infants
parameters.description: the number of infant travelers (whose age is less or equal to 2 on date of departure). Infants travel on the lap of an adult traveler, and thus the number of infants must not exceed the number of adults. If specified, this number should be greater than or equal to 0

parameters.name: travelClass
parameters.description: most of the flight time should be spent in a cabin of this quality or higher. The accepted travel class is economy, premium economy, business or first class. If no travel class is specified, the search considers any travel class

parameters.name: includedAirlineCodes
parameters.description: if specified, the flight offer will include at least one segment per bound marketed by one of these airlines. Airlines are specified as [IATA airline codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) and are comma-separated, e.g. 6X,7X,8X

parameters.name: excludedAirlineCodes
parameters.description: if specified, the flight offer will exclude all the flights marketed by one of these airlines. Airlines are specified as [IATA airline codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) and are comma-separated, e.g. 6X,7X,8X

parameters.name: nonStop
parameters.description: if set to true, the search will find only flights going from the origin to the destination with no stop in between

parameters.name: currencyCode
parameters.description: the preferred currency for the flight offers. Currency is specified in the [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) format, e.g. EUR for Euro

parameters.name: maxPrice
parameters.description: maximum price per traveler. By default, no limit is applied. If specified, the value should be a positive number with no decimals

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: maximum number of flight offers to return. If specified, the value should be greater than or equal to 1

properties.name: status
properties.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this error

properties.name: code
properties.description: an application-specific error code

properties.name: title
properties.description: a short summary of the error

properties.name: detail
properties.description: explanation of the error

properties.name: pointer
properties.description: a JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request document

properties.name: parameter
properties.description: a string indicating which URI query parameter caused the issue

properties.name: example
properties.description: a string indicating an example of the right value

properties.name: source
properties.description: an object containing references to the source of the error

definitions.name: FlightSegment
definitions.description: defining a flight segment; including both operating and marketing details when applicable

properties.name: departure
properties.description: departure or arrival information

at.description: local date and time in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-ddThh:mm:ss format, e.g. 2017-02-10T20:40:00

properties.name: arrival
properties.description: departure or arrival information

at.description: local date and time in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-ddThh:mm:ss format, e.g. 2017-02-10T20:40:00

properties.name: carrierCode
properties.description: providing the airline / carrier code

properties.name: number
properties.description: the flight number as assigned by the carrier

properties.name: aircraft
properties.description: information related to the aircraft

properties.name: operating
properties.description: information about the operating flight

properties.name: duration
properties.description: stop duration in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M

properties.name: stops
properties.description: details of stops for direct or change of gauge flights

properties.name: iataCode
properties.description: [IATA airline codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx)

properties.name: terminal
properties.description: terminal name / number

definitions.name: OriginalFlightStop
definitions.description: details of stops for direct or change of gauge flights

properties.name: iataCode
properties.description: [IATA airline codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx)

properties.name: duration
properties.description: stop duration in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M

definitions.name: FlightStop
definitions.description: details of stops for direct or change of gauge flights

properties.name: carrierCode
properties.description: providing the airline / carrier code

properties.name: total
properties.description: Total amount paid by the user

properties.name: base
properties.description: Amount without taxes

properties.name: fees
properties.description: a fee

properties.name: taxes
properties.description: a tax

properties.name: refundableTaxes
properties.description: The amount of taxes which are refundable

properties.name: type
properties.description: type of fee

definitions.name: TravelClass
definitions.description: quality of service offered in the cabin where the seat is located in this flight. Economy, premium economy, business or first class

properties.name: weight
properties.description: Weight of Co2 emitted for the concerned segment

properties.name: weightUnit
properties.description: Code to qualify unit as pounds or kilos

properties.name: cabin
properties.description: quality of service offered in the cabin where the seat is located in this flight. Economy, premium economy, business or first class

properties.name: originLocationCode
properties.description: Origin location, such as a city or an airport. Currently, only the locations defined in [IATA](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) are supported.

properties.name: originRadius
properties.description: Include other possible locations around the point, located less than this distance in kilometers away. Max:300

properties.name: alternativeOriginsCodes
properties.description: Set of alternative origin location, such as a city or an airport. Currently, only the locations defined in [IATA](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) are supported.

properties.name: destinationLocationCode
properties.description: Destination location, such as a city or an airport. Currently, only the locations defined in [IATA](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) are supported.

properties.name: destinationRadius
properties.description: Include other possible locations around the point, located less than this distance in kilometers away. Max:300

properties.name: alternativeDestinationsCodes
properties.description: Set of alternative destination location, such as a city or an airport. Currently, only the locations defined in [IATA](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) are supported.

properties.name: includedConnectionPoints
properties.description: List of included connections points. When an includedViaPoints option is specified, all FlightOffer returned must at least go via this Connecting Point. Currently, only the locations defined in IATA are supported. Used only by the AMADEUS provider

properties.name: excludedConnectionPoints
properties.description: List of excluded connections points. Any FlightOffer with these connections points will be present in response. Currently, only the locations defined in IATA are supported. Used only by the AMADEUS provider

properties.name: date
properties.description: Dates are specified in the [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2018-12-25

properties.name: dateWindow
properties.description: Either 1, 2 or 3 extra days around the local date (IxD for +/- x days - Ex: I3D), Either 1 to 3 days after the local date (PxD for +x days - Ex: P3D), or 1 to 3 days before the local date (MxD for -x days - Ex: M3D)

properties.name: time
properties.description: Local time. hh:mm:ss format, e.g 10:30:00

properties.name: timeWindow
properties.description: 1 to 12 hours around (both +and -) the local time. Possibly limited by the number of extra days when specified, i.e.  in some situations, it may not be used to exceed the maximum date range. [1-12]H format, e.g. 6H

properties.name: travelerType
description: age restrictions : CHILD < 12y, HELD_INFANT < 2y, SEATED_INFANT < 2y, SENIOR >=60y

properties.name: associatedAdultId
properties.description: if type="HELD_INFANT", corresponds to the adult travelers's id who will share the seat

properties.name: excludeAllotments
properties.description: This option allows to exclude the isAllotment flag associated to a booking class in the search response when it exist.

properties.name: addOneWayOffers
properties.description: This option allows activate the one-way combinable feature

properties.name: maxFlightOffers
properties.description: Maximum number of flight offers returned (Max 250)

properties.name: maxPrice
properties.description: maximum price per traveler. By default, no limit is applied. If specified, the value should be a positive number with no decimals

properties.name: allowAlternativeFareOptions
properties.description: This option allows to default to a standard fareOption if no offers are found for the selected fareOption.

properties.name: oneFlightOfferPerDay
properties.description: Requests the system to find at least one flight-offer per day, if possible, when a range of dates is specified. Default is false.

properties.name: chargeableCheckedBags
properties.description: If true, returns the price of the first additional bag when the airline is an "Amadeus Ancillary Services" member.

properties.name: brandedFares
properties.description: If true, returns the fare family name for each flight-offer which supports fare family

properties.name: pricingOptions
properties.description: fare filter options

properties.name: crossBorderAllowed
properties.description: Allows to search a location outside the borders when a radius around a location is specified. Default is false.

properties.name: moreOvernightsAllowed
properties.description: This flag enables/disables the possibility to have more overnight flights in Low Fare Search

properties.name: returnToDepartureAirport
properties.description: This option force to retrieve flight-offer with a departure and a return in the same airport

properties.name: railSegmentAllowed
properties.description: This flag enable/disable filtering of rail segment (TGV AIR, RAIL ...)

properties.name: busSegmentAllowed
properties.description: This flag enable/disable filtering of bus segment

properties.name: maxFlightTime
properties.description: This option allows to modify the value for the Elapsed Flying Time (EFT) masterPricer option

properties.name: blacklistedInEUAllowed
properties.description: This flag enable/disable filtering of blacklisted airline by EU. The list of the banned airlines is published in the Official Journal of the European Union, where they are included as annexes A and B to the Commission Regulation. The blacklist of an airline can concern all its flights or some specific aircraft types pertaining to the airline

properties.name: excludedCarrierCodes
properties.description: This option ensures that the system will only consider these airlines.

properties.name: includedCarrierCodes
properties.description: This option ensures that the system will only consider these airlines.

properties.name: carrierRestrictions
properties.description: Restriction towards carriers.

properties.name: cabin
properties.description: quality of service offered in the cabin where the seat is located in this flight. Economy, premium economy, business or first class

properties.name: coverage
properties.description: part of the trip covered by the travel class restriction (ALL_SEGMENTS if ommited)

properties.name: originDestinationIds
properties.description: The list of originDestination identifiers for which the cabinRestriction applies

properties.name: cabinRestrictions
properties.description: Restriction towards cabins.

properties.name: maxNumberOfConnections
properties.description: The maximal number of connections for each itinerary. Value can be 0, 1 or 2.

properties.name: airportChangeAllowed
properties.description: Allow to change airport during connection

properties.name: technicalStopsAllowed
properties.description: This option allows the single segment to have one or more intermediate stops (technical stops).

properties.name: connectionRestriction
properties.description: Restriction towards number of connections.

properties.name: type
properties.description: the resource name

properties.name: id
properties.description: Id of the flight offer

properties.name: source
properties.description: source of the flight offer

properties.name: instantTicketingRequired
properties.description: If true, inform that a ticketing will be required at booking step.

properties.name: disablePricing
properties.description: BOOK step ONLY - If true, allows to book a PNR without pricing. Only for the source "GDS"

properties.name: nonHomogeneous
properties.description: If true, upon completion of the booking, this pricing solution is expected to yield multiple records (a record contains booking information confirmed and stored, typically a Passenger Name Record (PNR), in the provider GDS or system)

properties.name: oneWay
properties.description: If true, the flight offer fulfills only one originDestination and has to be combined with other oneWays to complete the whole journey.

properties.name: paymentCardRequired
properties.description: If true, a payment card is mandatory to book this flight offer

properties.name: lastTicketingDate
properties.description: If booked on the same day as the search (with respect to timezone), this flight offer is guaranteed to be thereafter valid for ticketing until this date (included). Unspecified when it does not make sense for this flight offer (e.g. no control over ticketing once booked). YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2019-06-07

properties.name: numberOfBookableSeats
properties.description: Number of seats bookable in a single request. Can not be higher than 9.

properties.name: duration
properties.description: duration in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M for a duration of 2h10m

properties.name: price
properties.description: price information

properties.name: fareType
properties.description: type of fare of the flight-offer

properties.name: corporateCodes
properties.description: Allow Corporate negotiated fares using one or more corporate number (corporate code).

properties.name: includedCheckedBagsOnly
properties.description: If true, returns the flight-offers with included checked bags only

properties.name: refundableFare
properties.description: If true, returns the flight-offers with refundable fares only

properties.name: noRestrictionFare
properties.description: If true, returns the flight-offers with no restriction fares only

properties.name: noPenaltyFare
properties.description: If true, returns the flight-offers with no penalty fares only

properties.name: validatingAirlineCodes
properties.description: This option ensures that the system will only consider these airlines.

properties.name: travelerId
properties.description: Id of the traveler

properties.name: fareOption
description: option specifying a group of fares, which may be valid under certain conditons
Can be used to specify special fare discount for a passenger

properties.name: travelerType
description: age restrictions : CHILD < 12y, HELD_INFANT < 2y, SEATED_INFANT < 2y, SENIOR >=60y

properties.name: associatedAdultId
properties.description: if type="HELD_INFANT", corresponds to the adult traveler's id who will share the seat

total.description: Total amount paid by the user

refundableTaxes.description: The amount of taxes which are refundable

properties.name: segmentId
properties.description: Id of the segment

properties.name: cabin
properties.description: quality of service offered in the cabin where the seat is located in this flight. Economy, premium economy, business or first class

properties.name: fareBasis
properties.description: Fare basis specifying the rules of a fare. Usually, though not always, is composed of the booking class code followed by a set of letters and digits representing other characteristics of the ticket, such as refundability, minimum stay requirements, discounts or special promotional elements.

properties.name: brandedFare
properties.description: The name of the Fare Family corresponding to the fares. Only for the GDS provider and if the airline has fare families filled

properties.name: class
properties.description: The code of the booking class, a.k.a. class of service or Reservations/Booking Designator (RBD)

properties.name: isAllotment
properties.description: True if the corresponding booking class is in an allotment

properties.name: sliceDiceIndicator
properties.description: slice and Dice indicator, such as Local Availability, Sub OnD(Origin and Destination) 1 Availability and Sub OnD 2 Availability

properties.name: includedCheckedBags
properties.description: baggageAllowance

properties.name: chargeableCheckedBags
properties.description: baggageAllowance

properties.name: chargeableSeatNumber
properties.description: seat number

properties.name: otherServices
properties.description: type of service

properties.name: travelerPricings
properties.description: Fare information for each traveler/segment

definitions.name: TravelerType
description: age restrictions : CHILD < 12y, HELD_INFANT < 2y, SEATED_INFANT < 2y, SENIOR >=60y

properties.name: includedCheckedBagsOnly
properties.description: If true, returns the flight-offers with included checked bags only

definitions.name: Coverage
definitions.description: part of the trip covered by the travel class restriction (ALL_SEGMENTS if ommited)

definitions.name: PricingOptionsFareType
definitions.description: type of fare of the flight-offer

definitions.name: TravelerPricingFareOption
description: option specifying a group of fares, which may be valid under certain conditons
Can be used to specify special fare discount for a passenger

definitions.name: SliceDiceIndicator
definitions.description: slice and Dice indicator, such as Local Availability, Sub OnD(Origin and Destination) 1 Availability and Sub OnD 2 Availability

properties.name: cityCode
properties.description: City code associated to the airport

properties.name: countryCode
properties.description: Country code of the airport

properties.name: currency
properties.description: The currency of the penalties

properties.name: category
properties.description: This defines what type of modification is concerned in this rule.

properties.name: currencyCode
properties.description: The currency code, as defined in [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217), to reflect the currency in which this amount is expressed.

properties.name: sources
properties.description: source of the flight offer

properties.name: quantity
properties.description: Total number of units

properties.name: weight
properties.description: Weight of the baggage allowance

properties.name: weightUnit
properties.description: Code to qualify unit as pounds or kilos

name: Amadeus_FlightSearch
about: The **Flight Offers Search** REST/JSON API is an open search API that enables you to get cheapest flight recommendations and prices on a given journey.

The API provides a list of flight recommendations and fares from a given origin (city or airport), for a given date (or date range) and for a given list of passengers. Additional information such as bag allowance, first ancillary bag prices or fare details are also provided.

Before using the API you will need to get an access token. Please read our **[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization)** for more information on how to get your token.
List of supported operations by resource:
- GET: to do a quick search using key parameter
- POST: to do a customized search with every option available
